metadata.feature_description: Multi-language support for page management interface

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Verify UI strings are displayed in default language (English)

steps.action: Navigate to Pages admin panel and observe UI labels
steps.expected: All UI strings should be displayed with proper localized text
steps.actual: All UI strings display properly in English including: Pages header, Add Page, Add Multiple Pages, Save Page Template, Details/Permissions/Advanced tabs, Name*, Title, Description, Keywords, Tags, Parent Page, Page Type options, Status labels, and action buttons

steps.action: Click on Permissions tab to verify more localized strings
steps.expected: Permissions tab should display localized labels for all permission columns
steps.actual: Permissions tab displays properly localized English strings: PERMISSIONS BY ROLE, Filter By Group, role/View/Add/Content/Copy/Delete/Export/Import/Manage/Navigate/Edit Tab columns, PERMISSIONS BY USER section, and Copy Permissions to Descendant Pages button

steps.action: Click on Advanced tab to verify sub-tab localization
steps.expected: Advanced tab should display localized labels for all sub-tabs and content
steps.actual: Advanced tab displays properly localized English strings: Modules/Appearance/S.E.O./More sub-tabs, Modules on this page heading, Title/Module columns, and Cancel/Save buttons

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Test language switching for admin interface

steps.action: Switch site language to Spanish (es-ES) and access Pages admin panel
steps.expected: Admin interface may display in Spanish or remain in default language
steps.actual: After switching to Spanish locale (http://localhost:8081/es-es/), the Pages admin panel continues to display all UI strings in English. This is common behavior for admin interfaces which typically use the system default language rather than the content language

steps.action: View Details tab in Spanish locale
steps.expected: Form labels should be displayed consistently
steps.actual: All form labels remain in English including Name*, Title, Description, Keywords, Tags, Parent Page, Small Icon, Large Icon, Display in Menu, Workflow, Link Tracking, Enable Scheduling, Start Date, End Date, Cancel, Save. The admin interface maintains consistent English localization regardless of content language

observations: The Pages admin panel UI is fully localized in English with all labels, buttons, tabs, and tooltips displaying proper English text

Language switching from English to Spanish does not affect the admin panel UI - it remains in English. This is typical behavior where admin interfaces use system default language rather than the content locale
There is an unlocalized resource key 'nav_Accounts' visible in the PersonaBar sidebar navigation, indicating a potential missing localization entry in a different module
The code repository (Dnn.AdminExperience.Evoq.Basic) appears to be empty, so source code analysis of .resx localization files could not be performed
Date format in Spanish locale shows 9/2/2026 vs 2/9/2026 in English, indicating some localization awareness exists at the system level
